campaign.title: Article Advertising
campaign.subject: Get a feature article written about {{business_name}}

slides.title: Your Story, Told Well

content.headline: A Feature Article About Your Business
content.subhead: Published on our news platform, promoted everywhere

slides.narration: Imagine a feature article about your business. Not an ad—an actual story. Your journey, your expertise, what makes you different. Published on our news platform, promoted across all channels. This is the kind of exposure that builds real credibility.

slides.title: What You Get
slides.narration: Here's what you get. A professional interview—thirty minutes about your business, your story, your expertise. A written article, eight hundred to twelve hundred words, professionally edited. Professional photography of your business. Publication featured on our news site homepage. Newsletter feature to ten thousand plus subscribers. Social promotion across all channels. And permanent placement—the article stays live indefinitely, building your credibility forever.

slides.title: Why This Works

content.headline: Earned Media Credibility, Without the Wait

advantages.why: Not an ad—an article on a news platform
Share with prospects, on social, in proposals
News article = trusted source for AI

slides.narration: Why does this work so well? Third-party credibility—this isn't an ad, it's an article on a news platform. SEO value—you get an authoritative backlink to your site. Social proof—'As featured in' adds legitimacy. Shareable asset—share with prospects, on social, in proposals. And AI discoverability—remember, news articles are trusted sources that AI recommends from. One article, multiple benefits.

slides.title: Article Preview

structure.content: Compelling opening about your unique story
How you got started, your journey

slides.narration: Here's how we structure your article. We start with a hook—a compelling opening about your unique story. Then background—how you got started, your journey. What makes you different—your approach, philosophy, specialization. Customer impact—stories of people you've helped. What's next—your vision and upcoming offerings. And how to connect—clear next steps for interested readers.

slides.title: Article Results

examples.result: Article generated 14 consultation requests in first month
47% traffic spike the week article published
examples.quote: People came in with the article on their phone

slides.narration: What do feature articles deliver? A financial advisor got fourteen consultation requests in the first month—and the article is still generating leads eight months later. A restaurant saw a forty-seven percent traffic spike the week the article published. People came in with the article on their phone. A contractor uses his article in every proposal—his close rate improved twenty-three percent. This is content that keeps working.

slides.title: Get Your Article

content.headline: Ready for Your Feature Story?
content.urgency: Limited to 4 feature articles per month to maintain quality

slides.narration: Ready for your feature story? Book your article now. We limit feature articles to four per month to maintain quality, so spots fill up. Or see sample articles first to see the level of content we produce. Your story, told well, working for your business forever.
